long_description: With upright orientation and a roomy interior, the Timbuk2 Yield pannier easily hauls groceries after a quick trip to the store or protects your gear as you pedal to work in the rain. Exterior is built to last with rugged ballistic nylon and heavy-duty stitching; water-resistant lining keeps contents protected and makes clean up a breeze. Fast clip attachment system simplifies installation and removal of the pannier. Fully padded laptop sleeve fits most 15 in. computers; main compartment easily holds a change of clothes, groceries or school supplies. Lid secures with two side-release buckles; external zippered lid pocket keeps small essentials within easy reach. Timbuk2 Yield pannier features reflective detailing and attachment points for bike lights.
short_description: With upright orientation and a roomy interior, the Timbuk2 Yield pannier easily hauls groceries after a quick trip to the store or protects your gear as you pedal to work in the rain.
